```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(move)
```

```{r}
amwo <- getMovebankData(study = "American Woodcock Migration Ecology in Eastern North America", login = readRDS("movebank_credentials.rds"), timestamp_start = "20170801000000000", timestamp_end = "20210602000000000", removeDuplicatedTimestamps=TRUE) %>% as.data.frame()
```

Count the # of birds with at least one mig track
```{r}
amwo_filtered_ids <- amwo %>% 
  filter(migration_stage %in% c("Step state: Migratory (spring)", "Step state: Migratory (fall)")) %>% 
  pull(local_identifier) %>% 
  unique
#328 unique migrating birds in this timeframe
```
